about.title: WE ARE ABOUT BRAZIL
about.subtitle: A company in love with what it does
about.body: We are a Market Research company based in Brazil specialized in quantitative and qualitative studies. Our goal is to carry out market studies, helping companies of products and services in several countries in their process of taking marketing and/or trading decisions within their areas of operations. With extensive knowledge of Brazilian and Latin American markets, About Brazil stands out for designing and implementing great-value projects, ensuring high level of satisfaction to its customers. This is thanks to the extensive experience and training of its staff. We have wide range in terms of market research services, covering Brazil and Latin America, with local partners in many countries in this continent.
